exposition.arabic:
وَلمَّا سَبَّحُوا خَرَجُوا إِلَى جَبَلِ الزَّيْتُونِ.
فَقَالَ لَهُمْ يَسُوعُ: «كُلُّكُمْ تَشُكُّونَ فِيَّ فِي هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ، لأَنَّهُ مَكْتُوبٌ: أَنِّي أَضْرِبُ الرَّاعِيَ فَتَتَفَرَقُ غَنَمَ القَطِيعِ.

exposition.english:
And when they had sung a hymn, they went out to the Mount of Olives.
Then Jesus said to them, "All of you will be made to stumble because of Me this night, for it is written: 'I will strike the Shepherd, And the sheep of the flock will be scattered.'
exposition.englishcoptic:
owoh etaf esmo ef e evol epi to-o ente nigoit.
Tote pige Isos no-o je enthoten tiroteten na er eskandalizeste en ekhrei enkheet khen pai egorh. eskheiout ghar je ei a einy en-o erkhot ejen piman eso-o owoh ef egor evol enje ni eso-o ente pi ohy.

exposition.arabic:
وَمِنْ بَعْدَ قِيَامِي أَسْبِقُكُمْ إِلَى الْجَلِيلِ».,
فَأَجَابَ بُطْرُسُ وَقَالَ لَهُ: «لَوْ شَكَّ فِيكَ جَمِيعُهُمْ فَأَنَا لاَ أَشُكُّ ».,
فَقَالَ لَهُ يَسُوعُ: «الْحَقَّ أَقُولُ لَكَ: إِنَّكَ فِي هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَصِيحَ الدِيكٌ تُنْكِرُني ثَلاَثَ مَرَّاتٍ».,
قَالَ لَهُ بُطْرُسُ: «وَلَوِ بَلَغْتُ أَنْ أَمُوتَ مَعَكَ لَنْ أُجْحَدَكَ!» وَهكَذَا كَانَ يَقُولُ جَمِيعُ التَّلاَمِيذِ.,
exposition.english:
But after I have been raised, I will go before you to Galilee.",
Peter answered and said to Him, "Even if all are made to stumble because of You, I will never be made to stumble.",
Jesus said to him, "Assuredly, I say to you that this night, before rooster crows, you will deny Me three times.",
Peter said to Him, "Even if I have to die with You, I will not deny You!" And so said all the disciples.,
